useCase.name: User selects language
useCase.description: User wants to select a language for using the VoxMeteo Sahel System
useCase.trigger: User receives the voice prompt to select a language

mainSequence.step: System presents a voice prompt ("Welcome to VoxMeteo Sahel System, select language") to the Farmer
Farmer selects a language (1 for English, 2 for French, 3 for local languages)
System confirms the language selection made by the Farmer
Farmer navigates to the Main Menu after selecting the language
